main event: On May 6, 1960, Henry D. Bentley observed a strange oval-shaped object in Bentley, Michigan.
interesting points: The object was approximately 3 to 4 inches in diameter and observed from a distance of 900 feet., The sighting lasted about 25 to 30 seconds., The object moved in a straight and level flight path from south to north., It was traveling at a speed of 100 to 150 knots., The flying object was observed under clear weather conditions.
